title: Courteney Cox works with Jennifer Aniston's hairstylist Chris McMillan
text:
She debuted a new shag haircut with bangs just last month.

And Courteney Cox found herself in the salon once again on Thursday as her stylist Chris McMillan posted a photo of himself in the midst of blowdrying the Friends vet's damp locks. The 55-year-old actress gazed into the camera with a smirk as she waited for McMillan to finish his business.

McMillan came to fame as Jennifer Aniston's stylist, giving her the popular Rachel 'do in 1995 while she was on Friends.

Before: Courteney Cox found herself in the salon once again on Thursday as her stylist Chris McMillan posted a photo of himself in the midst of blowdrying the Friends vet's damp locks

He created this wonder: McMillan came to fame as Jennifer Aniston's stylist, giving her the popular Rachel 'do while she was on Friends in 1995

After: McMillan shared a photo later of Courteney's semi-finished 'do that featured blown out waves

She wore a white silk top and left her face free of makeup revealing a dewy complexion.

McMillan shared a photo later of Courteney's semi-finished 'do that featured blown out waves.

The post comes a few days after Courteney hosted a reunion for a couple of her Friends castmates at her home.

Aniston told The Howard Stern Show that the 'whole gang' reunited to break bread.

Throwback: The post comes a few days after Courteney hosted a reunion for a couple of her Friends castmates at her home

'We just had dinner this week. The whole gang. Everyone was there,' she said.

'...[David] Schwimmer was in town and we all happened to have a window of time, so we all got together...Oh my God, we laughed so hard.'

She then joked: 'Nobody got naked. It was very civilized. But we just laughed a lot.'

Courtney took to Instagram to post a selfie alongside Matt LeBlanc and Jennifer from the fun night.

Reunited: Courtney took to Instagram to post a selfie alongside Matt LeBlanc and Jennifer from the fun night

She captioned the sweet post: 'A rare night and I love it.'

And surprisingly enough, Jennifer said that over the years they've been acquainted, 'not one' of her co-stars have ever annoyed her.

When asked about her position on a rumored reboot of the show, Jennifer said: 'I really think there is an idea that if there is a reboot of the show, it won't be even close to what it was so why even do it…It would ruin it!'

Courteney is currently dating Irish musician Johnny McDaid. She was previously wed to actor David Arquette from 1999 to 2013.
